news_header: A teacher fatally stabbed an eight-year-old girl in South Korea, shocking the nation.
news_original_title: Teacher fatally stabs eight-year-old in South Korea
news_text: In a tragic incident in South Korea, a female teacher in her 40s fatally stabbed an eight-year-old girl at an elementary school in Daejeon. The girl was found with stab wounds and later pronounced dead at the hospital. The teacher, who was also injured, confessed to the crime and had previously shown violent behavior. The acting president has called for an investigation and measures to prevent such incidents in the future.
